comment: Back in the day, the hype was about Justin Timberlake and Brittany Spears, with everyone certain they were the perfect couple and meant to be because they were first loves and launched their careers at the same time. And now they are happy adults living their own separate lives.

            :time (b / before)
            :time (d / day))

                        :op1 (p3 / perfect-02

                                    :op2 p2))
                        :op2 (m2 / mean-02
                              :ARG1 a4
                              :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
                                    :ARG0 (a5 / and
                                          :op1 (l / love-01
                                                :ARG0 a4
                                                :ord (o / ordinal-entity
                                                      :value 1))
                                          :op2 (l2 / launch-01
                                                :ARG0 a4
                                                :ARG1 (c2 / career
                                                      :poss a4)
                                                :time (t / time

            :op2 (a6 / adult
                  :ARG1-of (h2 / happy-01)
                  :ARG0-of (l3 / live-01

                              :ARG1-of (s3 / separate-02)
                              :poss a6)
